Articles.Content:
We all jump off as A and D collide.

We are now in an empty space.

I will throw antimatter at the next poster

Since were' outside universes we make our own physics. I say antimatter dosn't do anything.

I create an identical universe A, and go to earth, for: 1. MOAR FOOD. 2. MOAR BOSTERZ. 3.HELLO, SAILOR.

My Flareon Army makes Universe E and Gravity dosen't exist. Teleporting dosen't exist. Protons don't exist.

I teleport the next poster to Universe E

I punch you really hard in the temple, knocking you out instantly. Chuck norris sends me back to the real universe.

The cops mistake the next poster for me, and try to arrest them for poke-cruelty.
The cops arrest you and Chuck Norris then you are in Universe E and with out gravity or teleporting!

Universe holds kerbin.

Jeb slams an asteroid into the next poster.

Effortlessly deflected when i use my magic keyboard to delete Universe E, the asteroid, and teleport me back to the real universe.

After discovering flare blitz isn't very effect against me AT ALL, i effortlessly mow down Fyre's Flareon Army with my magic keyboard.

I do the same to the next poster.

--------------------------------------------------ULTIMATE BETRAYAL----------------------------------------------------

Edited May 15, 2014 by Souper

I take away your magic keyboard, and throw it into mount doom.

I then throw a gitching kerbal at the next poster.

I spawn a Magic Keyboard from my hands and delete it.

I throw my magic keyboard at the next poster at 30,000 km/s.

I barely step aside.

I take away super's ability to have magic keyboards.

I rip out the heart of the next poster. Mortal Kombat style.

I have no heart.

I take out my magic sword and slash the next poster's head off.

I have the powers of luffy, and I'm not harmed.

I take away super's magic stuff and his privelages to use and create them.

I throw jeb attached to a sepatron at the next poster.

I punch the seperatron out of the way. They're tiny. Poor Jeb falls flat on his face. It's a real giggle and we got a great story out of it so we just laughed it off, headed to the Winchester, had a drink, and waited for the whole thing to blow over.

I persuade Jeb, in his drunken state, to attack the next user.
I use a Pulsed Energy Projection System to incapacitate Jeb and the other unfortunate poster that happens to be on the path.

Fine. I am knocked out. But since i'm right behind you, you're in the way, and therefore are not harmed because you are a kraken.

The next poster falls victim to my hi-tech totally non-magic laz0r gun, which activated when i fell on my back.

I have a moderator ban super from using any ADVANCED technology.

I have jeb send an unmanned spaceplane straight into the next poster's chest.

Being Jeb, he naturally cannot resist the temptation to do a few loop-de-loops, so he misses me.

I fire a Mainsail horizontally right next to the next poster, sending them flying.
The unmanned plane from the previous poster catches me, and I send it into the ground, generating a "little" explosion near the next poster.
I hack the forums and ban all the moderators FOREVER. Seeing as i am no longer banned from using hi tech, i then proceed to rip the next poster's jaw off with my bare hands.

I also hack, and unban all the mods. We then delete super's account for his naughtyness.

I blow up the next poster with a predator drone.

I go to the NHS, where they fix it for free .

I send out Johnny 5 to disassemble the next poster.

I throw lightning at it and the next poster.

*short circuits the focus of short circuit*

I have a rubber suit on.

I then eat a whole tub of sugar and run really fast off of a cliff, where i then land on the next poster at 200 m/s.

Edited May 18, 2014 by Souper

It turns out I can liquify my body and merge it with other peoples' bodies. I liquify and get splattered everywhere as you hit me

I merge with the next poster's body, and run off a cliff with it, before unmerging and hitting the ground safely, with my body fully restored (PS: It's a cliff over 100m high)
I had a jetpack, so i increased throttle right before hitting ground and landed unharmed - right at the next poster's head.
